title: Table 614.1 – Minimum Private Potable Water System Pump Size

content.heading: Table 614.1 – Minimum Private Potable Water System Pump Size

table: | Bathrooms in Home | Minimum Pump Size (gpm) |

content.text: 1. Values given are average and do not include higher or low extremes.
2. Installations over six bathrooms shall be approved by the code official.
